name: Knockout Hunter
description:
You have to knock out all your opponents throwing the balls. You are the hunter. Your opponents will try to escape. You have balls’ limit and time limit to win the maps. If you knock down all opponents, you won. If they escape you lose.
This is a game like dodgeball, but you being the hunter, the attack. Walk freely by the 3D maps, collect the balls and throw them.
Drag to move, with the free screen joystick. Tap to shoot.
First person camera and pretty nice ragdoll animations. Easy gameplay.
Enjoy knocking out your opponents!
